Posts.Content: Hi everyone, I have just had my 2nd cycle of TCYCLO last wednesday and it seems to be taking longer to recover from this session than the first, i have had the same symptons such as joint pain that doesnt respond to pain killers and have developed a piffy cough although i feel ok no temp is this normal to take longer to recover as the cycles increase? Julie xx
Posts.Title: Taking longer to recover from 2nd cycle of docetaxel/cyclophospha...
